name: Philosophy of Skateboarding
tagline: Skateboard, and Have Fun and Think Critically while Doing It
body:
This is a project that explores thinking regarding skateboarding, and how people may think about it better.

## Topics for Discussion

* The manner with which skateboarders think about riding boards, executing/performing tricks, and utilizing objects
* The physics/mechanics involved with the execution of tricks
* The language that skateboarders use
* The degree to which the language that skateboards use matches up with the concepts of physics

> The two limits upon our ability to make a science of any of our manners of acting have been our lack of high-speed cameras and our lack of an ability to record, transmit, and summon those manners of feeling that arise when we do each manner of acting. [We now have high-speed cameras](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_nZZaWobR-c), so let's get busy on the second bit.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
